page.title: 16A day in the life of David.
page.content: On a morning my mum wakes me up at eight 'o' clock . I have two sisters Jenny and Claire .Dad goes to work at seven fifteen and comes home at five thirty . At eight fourtyfive Julie and Philip come for a lift to school, at nine 'o' clock the bell goes . After register we have assembly and then mathematics and at ten thirty its playtime. After play on Tuesday we go swimming at Ripon ,I'm in the top group.When we get back it's dinner time,I have packed lunch .After dinner it's Topicwork and we have our own garden .Then it's last play . At three thirty it's home time and later on after tea I go to 7 _ 14's youth club at the leisure centre.
